com.koverse.sdk.sink

Interface RecordWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Flushable, RecordIo
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RecordWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRecordWriter, AbstractRecordWriter, DatabaseRecordWriter, ExportFileFormat

    public interface RecordWriter
extends RecordIo, Flushable
    Writes records.

    • Method Detail

      • writeRecord

        void writeRecord(SimpleRecord record)
          throws IOException
        Write a record. This should only be called when the state is Open. Calling at any other time will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to write.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an I/O Error or the state is not open.

      • writeRecord

        @Deprecated
void writeRecord(Recordable recordable)
                      throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Write a recordable object. A REcordable object know how to represent itself as a Record. This should only be called when the state is Open. Calling at any other time will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to write.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an I/O Error or the state is not open.

        Get the number of records that have been written.

        The number of records that have been written.
